title: Avalon Tech
author: Avalon Tech
content: Dear, I have to repair 2 AVALON1126 PRO-S mining machines.I would like to know what the problem could be and what solution I can give you:They take several minutes to connect, then they connect but only one of the two boards works.Thank you very much already

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: How did you know only 1 hashboard works?I suggest if you want some help we should need your complete API logs so that we can analyze the issue.Paste the Logs here but don't forget to put them inside the insert code tag it is a # button while editing your post.
